Name: Titre Provisoire (Provisional Title)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over cocktail and discard.
Review: Characterful cognac, herbal Bénédictine and rich fig liqueur are harmoniously balanced by dry vermouth and cider vinegar. This drink is finely balanced but when achieved it sings.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Matt Robertson at Hawksmoor Spitalfields in London, England. Matt's original recipe calls for Martell Cordon Bleu cognac.
Nutrition: One serving of Titre Provisoire (Provisional Title) contains 133 calories
